name: Inheritance (Sterling R)
description:
A demo for my current side-project, an adventure-puzzle game set in the mansion of the player's grandfather. Initially conceived as something to be prototyped over my winter break. Development may continue, depending on my workload in college this coming semester. Either way, enjoy.

Credits:

Game Design, Programming, Art, Audio - Sterling Rios

Music - Crusaderp

Art -  DragonDePlatino

Installation Instructions:

Unzip the file and be sure to have the .exe and data file in the same directory / folder.
